这是用https://www.mcmod.cn/class/1444.html这个模组做的

recipes.remove(<avaritia:block_resource:1>);

mods.avaritia.ExtremeCrafting.addShaped("NAMEPLACEHOLDER", <avaritia:block_resource:1> * 1, [[null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null], [null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null],[null, null, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, null, null],[null, null, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, null, null],[null, null, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, null, null],[null, null, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, null, null],[null, null, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:6>, null, null],[null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null],[null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null]]);
